HowItWork.subTitle: Better Understanding
HowItWork.title: How does AI Generative Fill work?
HowItWork.description: Step by step, here's how AI Generative Fill works:

steps.title: AI Analysis
steps.description: When you upload an image, AI Generative Fill analyzes the content and context of the area.

steps.title: Prompt Integration
steps.description: The AI interprets your prompt, understanding the desired outcome for the chosen part of the image.

steps.title: Content Generation
steps.description: Using advanced algorithms, AI Generative Fill generates new objects or elements that seamlessly blend into the selected area.

steps.title: Real-Time Rendering
steps.description: The final image is rendered in real-time, giving you an instant preview of the transformed content.

HowToUse.title: How to use Generative Fill AI

steps.title: Step 1: Upload the Image
steps.description: Upload the image you wish to generative fill.

steps.title: Step 2: Select an area
steps.description: Select an area where you wish to fill

steps.title: Step 3: Enter a prompt
steps.description: Enter the description or keywords related to the object you want to create.

steps.title: Step 4: Generate the Image
steps.description: Click Generate and in seconds, you will get the result.

steps.title: Landscape Images
steps.description: Transform your landscape photos by seamlessly adding new elements. Whether you want to insert a majestic mountain, a serene lake, or a charming cottage, our AI can blend these objects naturally into your existing scenery. Perfect for enhancing travel photos, creating dreamlike vistas, or visualizing landscape design ideas.

steps.title: Remove Object
steps.description: Clean up your photos by effortlessly removing unwanted elements. From photobombers to power lines, street signs to stray litter, our AI can intelligently erase these objects while preserving the background. This feature is ideal for decluttering scenic shots, improving real estate photos, or touching up personal memories without compromising image quality.

steps.title: Edit Image Object
steps.description: Unleash your creativity by modifying existing objects within your images. Change the color of a car, update the style of clothing, or transform the appearance of buildings. Our AI understands the context and lighting of your image, ensuring that edits look natural and integrated. This tool is perfect for product visualization, fashion design concepts, or reimagining architectural features in photos.
